_comment: Recipe Management System Configuration - Copy this file to config.json and fill in your values

n8n._webhook_note: This is the URL from Workflow 1's Webhook Trigger node. Found in the node settings after activating the workflow.

google_cloud_vision._note: Google Cloud Vision API key. Get from: console.cloud.google.com > APIs & Services > Credentials

anthropic._note: Anthropic API key. Get from: console.anthropic.com/settings/keys

google_sheets._sheet_id_note: The long ID from your Google Sheet URL: docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/{THIS_PART}/edit
google_sheets._oauth_note: Set up OAuth2 in n8n's Google Sheets credential. See README for instructions.

notion._api_note: Notion Internal Integration Token. Get from: notion.so/my-integrations
notion._db_id_note: From the Recipes database URL: notion.so/{workspace}/{THIS_PART}?v=...
notion._page_id_note: From the Weekly Shopping List page URL: notion.so/{THIS_PART}

web_interface._password_note: Choose a password, then generate its SHA-256 hash using the browser console: generatePasswordHash('your-password')
